title: Sonam Kapoor and Karla Bookman on Dismantling India's Patriarchy | BoF VOICES

description:
Women in India are pushing back against social norms that limit their opportunities, though it can be an uphill battle.

Sign up for BoF’s Daily Digest newsletter here: http://bit.ly/BoFnews.
